name: Solo Adventure Walk
description: One-on-one attention for your pup. Perfect for dogs who prefer solitude or need special attention. Includes water breaks and basic commands reinforcement.

name: Group Park Adventure
description: Socialization fun at the local park! Great for energetic dogs who love making friends. Supervised group play and exercise.

name: Puppy Introduction
description: Gentle introduction to walking for puppies 3-12 months. Focus on leash training and positive reinforcement.

name: Senior Stroll
description: Gentle, paced walks for older dogs. Accommodates mobility issues and provides companionship.

name: Weekend Hike
description: Nature adventure on local trails. Perfect for high-energy breeds who need extensive exercise.

name: Potty Break Express
description: Quick relief visit for busy days. In-and-out service for when you're stuck at work.

name: Training Walk
description: Structured walk focusing on leash manners, basic commands, and behavioral reinforcement.

name: Beach Day
description: Sandy paws adventure! Beach play, swimming (if dog likes water), and seaside exploration.

name: Evening Wind-Down
description: Calm evening walk to help your dog settle before bedtime. Lower stimulation route.

name: Double Trouble
description: Walk for two dogs from the same household. Sibling discount applied!

name: Medication Visit
description: Medical administration visit. Give medication, check on recovering pets, provide comfort.

name: Holiday Special
description: Festive season walks with holiday treats (if approved) and extra playtime.

name: Overnight Care
description: Extended care including overnight stay, multiple walks, feeding, and companionship.

name: Monthly Unlimited
description: Unlimited walks per month (up to 2 per day). Best value for regular clients.

name: Custom Package
description: Tailored service package designed specifically for your dog's unique needs and schedule.
